title: The Young Lady, Who Was Blessed By The Gorilla God, Is Adored In The Royal Knight Order.
alternative_title: Gorilla no Kami Kara Kago sareta Reijou wa Ouritsu Kishidan de Kawaigarareru ; The Young Lady, Who Was Blessed by the Gorilla God, Is Adored in the Royal Knight Order ;Gorilla no Kami Kara Kago sareta Reijou wa Ouritsu Kishidan de Kawaigarareru ; ゴリラの神から加護された令嬢は王立騎士団で可愛がられる ; 고릴라 신의 가호를 받은 영애는 왕립기사단의 사랑을 받는다
status: Gorilla no Kami Kara Kago sareta Reijou wa Ouritsu Kishidan de Kawaigarareru ; The Young Lady, Who Was Blessed by the Gorilla God, Is Adored in the Royal Knight Order ;Gorilla no Kami Kara Kago sareta Reijou wa Ouritsu Kishidan de Kawaigarareru ; ゴリラの神から加護された令嬢は王立騎士団で可愛がられる ; 고릴라 신의 가호를 받은 영애는 왕립기사단의 사랑을 받는다
description:
Description :
        In this world, 16-year-olds receive blessings from various animal gods. The timid count's daughter Sophia Lila is rumored to be quite strong, having received the blessing from the "Gorilla God." Although she wants a peaceful life, people seek her out due to immense power. Ultimately, she is scouted by the royal knights. The promising young knights intently follow Sophia, the strongest girl.
